article.title: October 2013 Galaxy Update
article.content:
The October 2013 Galaxy Update is out:

Highlights:

  • A record six new public servers
  • 44 new papers
  • Open Positions at nine different organizations
  • Upcoming Events, lots of them in Australia plus 3 other continents.
  • Online materials from past events, including all GCC2013 videos on Vimeo and course materials for the 2013 UC Davis Bioinformatics Short Course. The UC Davis course featured 5 great days of lecture and hands-on exercises.
  • More Tool Shed contributions than you can shake a stick at.

If you have anything you would like to see in the next Galaxy Update, please let us know.

Dave Clements and the Galaxy Team
